hopobject.name: Disko
hopobject.body: Disko is a Linux-based toolkit to build touchscreen- and remote-controllable ui applications. It contains native OMAP framebuffer support and the media content is DSP-accelerated by GStreamer (TI-Codecs). Disko is based on a plugin oriented approach, which allows users to add new functions easily and share them between different applications.
hopobject.shortdesc: Disko is a Linux-based toolkit to build touchscreen- and remote-controllable ui applications. It contains native OMAP framebuffer support and the media content is DSP-accelerated by GStreamer (TI-Codecs).
